text: A new study deploys optogenetics to induce the yeast bud on demand, at a site determined by a laser spot. The authors definitively prove that the initiation of cell polarization is driven by the Bem1-mediated positive feedback loop and reveal novel features of its regulation by the cell cycle.
title: Cell Polarity: Spot-On Cdc42 Polarization Achieved on Demand.
